titles.title: To clarify the rules of origin for textile and apparel products from American Samoa.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/9/1996--Introduced. Declares that certain rulings and administrative practices that were applied on June 30, 1996, to determine the origin of textile and apparel products of American Samoa for purposes of the customs laws and administration of quantitative restrictions shall apply on or after enactment of this Act.
